title: Unintentionally ordering a red or white pizza
note: They should put any red (no cheese) or white (no sauce) pizzas in a separate part of the menu. I have my night ruined two or 3 times a year by accidently ordering one of these things. 0.2 microCormys awarded because it allows for an enjoyable tirade.

title: Winning big on a scratchcard
note: Winning big is any win which is 10X more than the value of the scratchcard. This feels absolutly brilliant, 0.2 microCormys docked because you're likely to hand the winnings straight back to the National Lottery

title: Sinners
creator: Ryan Coogler
note: Top notch film, I thought Michael B. Jordan was outstanding. Irish vampire, Rocky Road to Dublin and generally a fair bit of air time the Irish (although unsure if we are considered oppressors or oppressed). Only minor drawback was the faint marvel style of the closing scenes.
